title: Neruppu Da Lyrics Kabali Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kabali Neruppu Da Song Lyrics With English Meaning
Rap and Lyrical: Arunraja Kamayaj

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
neruppuda!!
nerungudaa!!
mudiyumaa ?

neruppuda
nerunguda paarpom
nerunguna
posukkura koottam

adikkira
alikkura Â ennam
mudiyumaa?
nadakkuma? innum

adakkunaa
adangura aalaa nee.
iluthadhum
piriyira noolaa nee.
thadai ellaam
madhikkura aalaa nee.
Vidiyala
virumbidum kabali.

magizhchi!!!

karunayai maru
kavalaigalai aru
idhayaththil oru
irukkam varum poru

yaavum ingae
maayam maayam
un veeram endrum
seeri paayum
nam dhesam engum
rosam yerum
oru vaarthai kooda
pudhu maattram
kaanum.

naan vandhutenu sollu
thirumbi vandhutenu
irupaththi anju
varushathukku munnaala
eppudi ponaano
kabali
appadiye thirumbi
vandhutaanu
sollu.

kabali daa!!!

viduthalai adai
vidaienna ninai
Bayathaye murai
pagal kanavai udai

veeram thiyaagam
modhum modhum
un tholil
kaayam aarum aarum
ini krotham dhrogam
maayum maayum
varungaalam iniyum
ithigaasamaagum.

kabali ..
kabali ..
kabali....

English Meaning
I tried my best :)
The fire!!
Get closer!!
Can you ?

The fire!!
Get closer, let's see
If you get closer,
This team burns you.

Intention to
Beat and destroy.
Is it possible ?
Will it happen ? yet

When controlled
Can you be controlled ?
When pulled
Can you be untied like thread?
Obstacles,
are nothing before you.
Kabali,
Love's end for problems.

Very Happy!!!

Refuse mercy ,
Forgot your worry,
Wait until you get
hold in your heart.

Everything here
is magic magic.
your heroism,
always rage forward!!
Self confidence
Will arise in nation,
One word can
Make a new
difference

Tell him I have come,
I have come back,
Tell him
kabali has come
without any
change
when he went
away
25 years ago

Its KABALI!!

Capture freedom
Think as an answer
Stare at the fear
Break the day dream.

When courage, sacrifice
Clashes
Your wounds will heal
on your shoulder.
Animosity and betreyal
Will die.
Future will become
An epic

kabali ..
kabali ..
kabali....
